issue.title: [Format] Metadata.rst does not specify timezone for Timestamp type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4194](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4194). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Schema.fbs states that Timestamp type consists of unit and timezone, but Metadata.rst just has unit. This seems like an error.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4194?focusedCommentId=16737258) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
There is a bit of slippage between these files; there has not been consistent effort to keep them in sync

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4194?focusedCommentId=16792821) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Will address this more comprehensively when working on the spec documents in the next few months

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4194?focusedCommentId=16862149) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4523
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4523>
